note.p: American. Daughter of Gideon Barstow III and Nancy Forrester of Salem, Massachusetts. Keeping house for two of her older brothers in Portsmouth, Rhode Island, 1880. Resided in Boston, 1910.
Massachusetts, US, death records, 1841–1915 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 February 2021)
United States Federal Census 1880 (Portsmouth, Newport, Rhode Island 88/52D), 1910 (Boston, Suffolk, Massachusetts 1420/2B) (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 February 2021)
